# bunkerweb_config_upload (Ephemeral Resource)

Uploads one or more custom configuration files via the BunkerWeb API during plan/apply.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `files` (Attributes List) Files to upload. Names are sanitized by the API to match BunkerWeb naming rules. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--files))
- `type` (String) Configuration type (e.g. `http`, `stream`).

### Optional

- `service` (String) Target service identifier; defaults to `global` when omitted.

### Read-Only

- `result` (String, Sensitive) JSON-encoded response payload describing the uploaded configs.

<a id="nestedatt--files"></a>
### Nested Schema for `files`

Required:

- `content` (String, Sensitive) File content to send. Use Terraform functions like `file()` or `filebase64decode()` as needed.
- `name` (String) File name associated with the upload part.
